title: A declaration of an order for the making of certaine small cases for ballaunces and waightes to weigh all maner of golde coynes currant with the realme  ...
author: England and Wales. Lord High Treasurer (1572-1598 : Burghley)
publisher: By the deputies of Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,
